name: crop-and-trim
description: An add-on for Google Sheetsâ„¢ that allows you to easily remove extra rows and columns.
author: Eric Koleda <ekoleda+devrel@googlers.com>

scripts.pull-dev: cp ./settings/dev/.clasp.json ./ && json -I -f .clasp.json -e "this.rootDir='src'" && clasp pull && rm -rf ./settings/dev/assets && mv ./src/_assets ./settings/dev/assets
scripts.pull-prod: cp ./settings/prod/.clasp.json ./ && json -I -f .clasp.json -e "this.rootDir='src'" && clasp pull && rm -rf ./settings/prod/assets && mv ./src/_assets ./settings/prod/assets
